title: [Large-Scale] Digital Textbook Learning Design for Secondary Teachers: Scaffolding Strategies Based on Learning Maps

context.prior_knowledge: Basic ICT proficiency and understanding of secondary education curricula
context.additional_context: Short intensive course for pre-service/in-service teachers to enhance e-textbook design competencies, conducted in mobile environments using personal devices

learning_goals: The learning structure of e-textbook units can be designed using learning map templates
Scaffolding strategies can be applied to organize e-textbook content according to learner proficiency levels
Formative assessments can iteratively improve the initial design draft of digital textbooks.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
